### `r pr_name` {.tabset}

```{r eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, fig.height=7, fig.width=7, tidy=FALSE}
  
  admColScale <- make_adm_colour_palette()

  ed_los_data_1 <- ed_los_data[ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month >= 201611 & ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month <= 201701,]
  
  ed_los_data_2 <- ed_los_data[ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month >= 201511 & ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month <= 201601,]

  plot_ed_dist(ed_los_data_1, cumulative = TRUE, prov_codes = c(pr)) + admColScale + labs(subtitle = "Nov 2016 - Jan 2017")
  
  cat("  \n")
  
  plot_ed_dist(ed_los_data_2, cumulative = TRUE, prov_codes = c(pr)) + admColScale + labs(subtitle = "Nov 2015 - Jan 2016")
```
